11.content:
You are at Abbeyfields All Girls School.

You are either a teacher, and your choices are:

Timothy Beddison, 28 years old, who is a new teacher to the school having graduated with a MSc in Strructural Engineering and two other BSc's. He had worked for a construction firm but when they went bust he decided to teach until he could find another job. Timothy lives with his wife Caroline and together you have 1 daughter Laura who is 3 yrs old. He has to fit in at the school and cope with teaching all female classes. Timothy is to be a Geography & Physics teacher.
http://i60.tinypic.com/egr7yq.jpg

or

Vicki Richardson, 29 years old, who has been at the school for 5 years.
http://i61.tinypic.com/nx01vb.jpg

She started as a history teacher then progressed to Head of Department but has decided to change and is now Head of Maths. She lives with her fiancee Matt and they have a son Toby who is 4.

You can also be one of Abbeyfields pupils
The school itself is a boarding school for girls between the ages of 16 to 25 and has about 2000 pupils. It is a well recognised school in terms of pupil results and is always in high demand when it comes to people applying.

Your choice of pupils are:

Holly Gilby, 18 years old and a very clever girl.
http://i57.tinypic.com/6jnlth.jpg


Holly has long brown hair. She is in her third year at Abbeyfields and is also Head of Trojan House (on the school's campus are many houses where the girls live and they each have names. One girl is picked as Head of House and holds the title for a year).

Gemma Tyson, 16 years old.
http://i61.tinypic.com/j5896o.jpg

Gemma is here for her first day at the school and keen to make new friends and fit in.
Gemma moved from Scotland with her family and Abbeyfields is the nearest school for her to attend.

Finally you can be one of the Wardens who are assigned to the girls houses. These are allowed to be males but they have a girlfriend within the school.
Choices are:

Simon Robson, 18 years old and has a girlfriend called Katrina within the school who is also 18.
Simon with girlfriend Katrina: http://i58.tinypic.com/10f1jrp.jpg

Martyn Patrick, 23 years old and his girlfriend is Lucy who is part of the cheerleading team. Lucy is 22 and very beautiful.
Martyn Patrick: http://i59.tinypic.com/1etj4w.jpg
Lucy Chambers: http://i59.tinypic.com/30bnyie.jpg

So which character are you going to be?

112.content: You are Gemma Tyson, the 16 year old Scottish girl.

choices: One foot tall.

1121.content:
With her 'unusual' accent and mannerisms, Gemma was having a bit of trouble adjusting to life at her new school. She wasn't sure why her parents had to move her away from her friends back in Scotland, but she'll be damned if she lets it get to her.

After all, if they couldn't understand a thing she was saying, she could say what she wanted, right?

It was a huge culture shock, being in a different country, with different people, different rules, different everything. But Gemma was getting used to it, having lived here for a month now. But there was one change she didn't take into account; her size.

How small does Gemma shrink?

1151.content:
You are Simon Robson and you are 18.

You are employed by Abbeyfields School for Girls as a House Warden and you are responsible for Roebuck House.

There are 5 girls who live in this house
> Judy, 19 and has long blond hair, brown eyes and a retainer on her teeth.
http://i59.tinypic.com/124dn4i.jpg

Judy has a crush on Simon and fancies him.

> Jess, 17 and has black hair, blue eyes.
http://i61.tinypic.com/2j43vkh.jpg

http://i58.tinypic.com/2qntstv.jpg

> Louise, 18 with long brown hair and green eyes.
http://i57.tinypic.com/2q99enl.jpg

One evening you were on your rounds checking none of the 16 to 18 year old girls of Abbeyfields School for Girls were outside their houses.

As you passed Roebuck house you saw a light on in their kitchen.
Taking out your keys you enter Roebuck House and climb the stairs.
Going inside the door to the house you tap in the code on the door and the door hisses open.

The corridor is in darkness apart from some light shining out from the kitchen.
Then you are grabbed from behind and a hand is put over your mouth. A blindfold is put over your eyes and you are dragged along the floor by someone.
1151.title: Kidnapped by the Roebuck Girls

choices: "OK Judy I will be your boyfriend"
"No way, I'm not leaving Katrina whatever you say"
11511.content:
Being dragged along the floor you try to scream but whoever's hand is covering your mouth is held their tight.

You are thrown against the sofa and then the blindfold is removed from your eyes.

As your eyes adjust to the light you look around and see the Roebuck Girls surrounding you.
Your shirt has been ripped off and the girls are rubbing their hands over your body.

"Is it me or has it got rather hot in here?" you say

"He's gorgeus isn't he Nat?" Judy said rubbing her hand down your neck.

"I might have known it would be you Judy!" you say

"I've always had a crush on you Simon." Judy said displaying her perfect teeth complete with braces.

"Judy, you know I have a girlfriend already. I think you are a very beautiful girl and all that but I can't leave Katrina. She would kill me!" you reply

"Well Simon. Me and my friends have a little surprise for you. Before you leave this flat you will have agreed that you are going to leave Katrina and be my boyfriend..."

You interuppt her
"But I can't do that..."

Judy cuts you short
"Wait I haven't finished yet! Either you become my boyfriend or Louise is going to shrink you and you will find yourself swimming in a bowl of dip while we have a little snack and eventually one of us will eat you alive." Judy said grinning evilly.

"You don't seriously mean that, do you?" you ask Judy horrified.

"Oh I am certain of eveything I have just said." Judy replied

Do you agree to Judy's demand or are you adement that you are staying with Katrina?
11511.title: Roebuck Girls ransom demand

choices: "How about a game of mouse trap, and your the mouse!"
"I think its time for a little snack, don't you Judy?"
115112.content:
"Sorry Judy but I won't leave Katrina for anyone no matter what their demands are."

Judy grinned evilly.

"Well then let the games begin. Louise will you go and collect the shrink ray from your room?" Judy asked

"Sure, be back in a mo." Louise replied

A couple of minutes later Louise returned carrying a small remote control.

"All yours Lou." Judy said standing back from you.

There was a whirring noise and then Louise pointed the remote straight at you. She pressed a button and then a long blue bolt emitted from it and hit you full in the chest.

Within seconds you were shrinking in size but your clothes stayed the same size.
When everything had settled down you were stood on the carpet completely naked and cold.

Then above you were the faces of the 5 Roebuck Girls and now they looked much more terrifying.

Judy's huge hand descended towards you and then sets you on the kitchen counter.

"We've got a pizza on the way and we're going to enjoy torturing you until you change your mind." she said with another evil grin.

You get passed round each of the girls who say various things to you and giggle at you evilly. Then you are placed back on the kitchen counter.

20 minutes later Natalie has got 5 pack of soda, three cups of ice, two bags of doritos and a fresh bowl of onion dip.

The pizza arrives and Jess pays the delivery boy. He is kidnapped aswell and shrunk like yourself but Natalie puts him in her room under a glass until she is ready to play with him.

Judy opens the box of pizza and smells it.
"mmm looks delicious." she said taking a slice of pizza

While you are being passed between the girls you are starting to wonder what they have in store for you.

Judy is most proud as she has fancied you for a long time.
Being slim and a very attractive girl Judy has had quite a few boyfriends over the past few years. But she never seems to stay with them for longer than 6 or 7 months.

Natalie then comes up with an idea

choices: "No I won't be your boyfriend and that's final!"
"Please don't hurt Katrina and I might be your boyfriend"
1151122.content:
"I think its time for a little snack, don't you Judy?" Natalie said

"Yep I think so." Judy replied

"No Judy please, what are you thinking of? You can't eat me!" you scream madly.

"Wait there, when did I say I was going to eat you?" Judy said. "Besides if I eat you then you won't be able to become my boyfriend. No when I said it was time for a little snack I meant someone else." Judy said

"Rachel, bring her in!" Judy called.

A short girl entered the kitchen carrying a small wooden box. She set it down on the counter and took out a young girl from the box.

As Rachel takes the girl from the box you see in horror that it is your girlfriend Katrina. She has been shrunk and is being held by Rachel between her fingers.

Your turn to Judy in tears.

"I didn't think you were going to shrink Katrina, what are you going to do with her?"

"Well that's up to you and whether you decide to be my boyfriend or not!" Judy said planting a kiss on your cheek. "I think you are really gorgeous Simon and I would love to have you as my boyfriend." Judy said.

There is a loud rumble from all around you and you turn to Judy scared.

"What was that?" you ask

"That was our stomach's rumbling, because we are very hungry and waiting for you to decide whether you are going to be my boyfriend is taking too long. Now are you going to be my boyfriend or not?" Judy asked sternly.

You look over at your girlfriend being held between Rachel's fingers and back at Judy.

Katrina signals to you and struggles to free herself from Rachel's fingers but she is being held too tight.

"I'm waiting for your answer Martyn?" Judy said impaitently

Without hesitation you give Judy your answer.

"No I won't be your boyfriend and that's final! Besides your too young for me and I love Katrina and Katrina only" you say

"Choose quickly otherwise I'll eat her now!" Judy said licking her lips at Katrina.

Judy slowly chews Katrina to pieces

It's tails- Judy's going to eat your girlfriend

"It's tails!" she said happily.

Judy stood up and went over to Rachel who was still holding Katrina between her fingers. Rachel handed her to Judy and Judy returned to where you were and knelt down on the floor.

She then tipped back her head and opened her mouth as wide as she could, dangling your shrunken girlfriend above her open mouth.

You watch in horror as Judy lowers Katrina fully clothed into her mouth. She closes her mouth and then lowers her face towards you. Judy opens her mouth and you can see your girlfriend inside between Judy's large white teeth. She is on Judy's puink tongue unable to move as she is so terrified, she screams "I love you Martyn" as Judy closes her mouth and then
115112211.title: Witnessing your girlfriend becoming Judy food

choices: Your now Judy's boyfriend, continue the story
Katrina is reported missing, what do you say?
1151122111.content:
"Please Judy, be serious and don't eat my girlfriend. What is that going to do?" you say

Judy ignores you and smiles, then with an evil giggle she once again slowly tips back her head and then with an audible gulp swallows Katrina alive.
You see the bulge go down her throat along with the a terrifying gulping sound as she swallows.

Judy licks her lips and then opens her mouth wide, you look into her huge mouth and see that your girlfriend is no longer inside.

"I can't believe you just did that," you said. "I just can't believe you've eaten my girlfriend."
Judy licked her lips again and laughed
"Oh I can believe it, she went down beautifully and she very tasty aswell. Now your girlfriend is inside my stomach then you are my new boyfriend." she said

Having just watched Judy swallow your girlfriend alive in seconds you are unsure that you want to be Judy's boyfriend but being threatened with being eaten just like your girlfriend you deciede its best to agree.

Judy smiles happily.

"I'm glad you'd see sense in the end Martyn." she said

"Well I haven't got a lot of choice have I. With my girlfriend being digested inside your stomach and you threatening to eat me aswell if I didn't become your boyfriend then I suppose I should say yes."

Louise gets the shrinking device and recalibrates it. She then aims it at you and presses the trigger.
A white bolt of light emitts from the nozzle and hits you. Within seconds you are returned to your normal size. Almost immediately Judy throws her arms around you and kisses you passionately.

With thoughts running through your head that you are kissing a girl who has just eaten your now ex-girlfriend a tear comes to your eye.

Eventually Judy releases her arms from around you and drags you into her room locking the door behind her. She then jumps onto her bed and strips her clothes off. In her bra and knickers she strips you and then preceeds to make love to you on her bed.

After a while you start to think that Judy is a very beautiful girl even though she is a lot younger than you, but you still can't believe that you are making love to a girl who has eaten your ex-girlfriend and digesting her inside her stomach.
1151122111.title: Making love to Judy- what now for your future

choices: play a game, using you as her counter
take you to bed with her
1151122112.content:
In Judy's mouth, Katrina is terrified and tries to escape as the two rows of huge white teeth clamp shut encasing everything in darkness. Judy has a evil smile on her face as she moves Katrina around her mouth coating her with saliva. She then manuvers her onto her teeth. She waits, holding her there for a moment, then starts to chew. You close your eyes unable to watch as ther is a wet crunching sound from Judy.
Katrina screamed with pain as Judy's powerful jaws crunched and chewed her tiny body to pieces in seconds.

Judy smiles and swallows, mming.

"Yummy yummy, going to my tummy!" She says, rubbing her belly slowly. "You had a really delicious girlfriend. She was crunchy and also quite chewy." Judy said running her long pink tongue over her front teeth and around her mouth.
Looking down Judy's body you see her stomach where the remains of your girlfriend are now being digested.
Judy sighs quite happilly, and leans back, rubbing her belly contently as she smiles down at you
"Mmmmmm, she really was good! Wish everyone I ate tasted as good as her! Hee hee!."

Now that Judy has eaten your girlfriend, what does she want to do with you first?

You are a pupil at Harrington Comprehensive School which is situated near Oxford.

You are either:

Jaime Forrest who is 13 years old and in Year 9. Jaime is very clever and loves History. He lives with his parents Micky and Kathryn and has two sisters: Hannah who's 16 and Michelle who's 17.

or

Shelley Boaden, who is 16 years old and in Year 11. Shelley is a straight A pupil and is currently taking 12 GSCE's. She is predicted very high grades in her exams and her parents are thinking of sending her to Cambridge should she excell in her exams at the end of the year.
Shelley lives with her mother Kirsty and she has a boyfriend David, who is also 16. Shelley is an only child.

You are Jaime Forrest, 13 years old. You really enjoy school especially History.
http://i62.tinypic.com/2imat6r.jpg

Your father Micky: http://i57.tinypic.com/2m7gcol.jpg is an RAF Flying Instructor and he has got you interested in Military History. You have great respect for your father and he has promised to take you up in one of his aircraft sometime.


A bright sunny June morning greeted you as you open the curtains and the sunshine streams in. Getting dressed into your school uniform you hear your sister Hannah (15) whistiling as she goes downstairs.
Hannah is up early every morning as she has to go and sort out her horse which is kept in one of the fields.
With your father and RAF Flying Instructor and your mother also having a very well paid job your parents salary between them is '140,000, therefore you live in a large house with 15 acres of land. You have a quad bike which you enjoy driving round one of the fields and your two sisters both have horses. Hannah has 2 and your other sister Michelle has 3.

Hannah with her favourite horse Ellie:
http://i62.tinypic.com/20ql1j7.jpg

Michelle (20) cleaning the shoe of her favourite horse Jinx:
http://i60.tinypic.com/iyihqd.jpg

Both of your sisters are very beautiful girls and are also very succesful riders having won many competitions with their horses. In their rooms are row upon row of trophies and cups they have won.

Descending the stairs you walk into the kitchen. Your mother is sat at the table reading the morning paper. Your father has already left for work as he has to be at the RAF base for 7am.
"Morning dear, you sleep well." your mother said
"Yes thanks." you reply

Going over to the cupboard you take out a bowl and put it on the worktop. Taking out a box of cornflakes from the cupboard you fill the bowl half full with orange flakes then drenching them with milk you take your bowl and sit at the table.

20 minutes later, having finished your breakfast Hannah and Michelle come into the kitchen having finished sorting out their horses. Michelle put two slices of bread into the toaster and waited for them to toast while Hannah poured herself a bowl of Shreddies and then sat down at the table.

You went upstairs leaving your sisters to have their breakfast and got sorted in the bathroom.

Collecting your school bag from your room you went back downstairs and put on your shoes.

"Right see you this evening Mum." you say as you unlock the front door.
"I won't be home till about 9pm tonight as I have to work late, so your father will be cooking tea depending on what time her lands and sorts things out at work." she replies

Walking to school which is only a 20 minute walk away you meet up with some of your school mates along the way.

Finally arriving at your school you head for your form room and take your seat. There are about 30 people in your class most of them are boys but there are some girls and for a while you have fancied two in particular but don't have the courage to go and speak to them and maybe ask them out. They are Gemma and Laura.

Gemma is a very pretty girl with blond hair and lovely green eyes. She has a stunning figure and always very strong perfume.
Laura is very quiet but just as beautiful. She has shoulder length blond hair and blue eyes.

Gemma:http://i62.tinypic.com/w2bssz.jpg
Lauren: http://i59.tinypic.com/2ronrqc.jpg


Then your form tutor Miss Todd enters the room.

Miss Todd: http://i60.tinypic.com/35kuan7.jpg

"Morning everyone, take your seats please!" she said as she sat at her desk.
She took the register and then read out some notices to the class.

A young girl entered the room and then closed the door behind her.
"Sorry I'm late Miss!" she said

"Alright Sophie, how come your late?" Miss Todd asked

"I missed my bus this morning and had to get the next one." Sophie replied

"OK no problem, you've not missed anything."

The bell then rang to signal the end of registration and Miss Todd stood up.
"Right I will see some of you for English later today." she said as her form began to file out.

You exit the classroom and head down the stairs along with two of your friends Dean and Gary. While walking along the corridor Dean and Gary divert off to their lesson while you continue on.
Suddenly you begin to feel dizzy and black out.

When you wake up you find that eveything is very big. To your horror you realise you have shrunk.

Stood in the middle of the corridor looking down it towards the doors at the end you see a group of pupils walking towards you. Within seconds they are upon you and you come very close to being stepped on. Thankfully they brush past you and you decide to move to the side of the corridor.

What do you decide to do next?

She then

"Well what do we have here, a little boy." she whispered.

"Who's the appetiser?" you asked trying to crack a joke.

Charlotte dropped you back into the bowl and then went over to the box of little people and grabbed two from the box and brought them back to the bowl. She then dropped them into the bowl beside you. A girl who was probably about 12 or 13 and a boy maybe 6 or 7.

Charlotte then hovered her finger above you all and eventually snatched the boy. "Looks like its you." she said. Charlotte eating her appetiser: http://youtu.be/IflvrGJr02M

"mmm, little men taste so good." she said licking her lips. "Right now for the main course."

It sizzled as it melted, then Charlotte lay the girl down on the chopping board and picked up the knife. The girl was screaming thinking that Charlotte was going to slice her up. "Don't worry I am not going to slice you up, my teeth will do that. No I am going to remove your clothes unless you want to take them off instead."

The girl calmed down a bit and obeyed. She stripped off her clothes until she was totally naked. "Perfect, that is much better as I hate cotton." Charlotte said. She picked the girl up and dropped her into the pan, instantly the girl screamed as the hot pan burnt her, Charlotte flipped her over with the knife and flash fried her body but making sure that she was still alive, then got a pair of tongs and picked her up and put her back in the bowl.

The girl was shaking and screaming in pain and swearing at Charlotte. Charlotte meanwhile got a bread bun, some lettuce, tomatoes and some cheese slices and began chopping the tomatoes on the chopping board.

You decide to try to speak to the girl in the bowl with you but she is not interested in talking to you she is just crying and screaming.

Charlotte finishes making her bun and appears above the bowl again. "Time for the final filling." she said picking the girl up. She kicked and screamed as she was picked up but Charlotte's grip was too strong and there was no way she was going to escape. She was laid down on top of a lettuce leaf with cheese & tomato slices below her, Charlotte then got the top bun and sealed her in. She then picked up the bun and raised it to her lips, opening her mouth she takes a large bite and chews while giggling evilly. After three further bites the bun is gone. Charlotte licks her lips and her fingers and then looks down at you in the bowl.

"Your next Jaime, and it is dessert time for you." she said. "Now fruit salad or ice cream brownie and chocolate sauce." Charlotte said out loud.

"Ice Cream Brownie & Chocolate sauce, gotta be." Charlotte said licking her lips.

She skipped off and got some ice cream from the freezer and a brownie from the fridge. She then made some chocolate sauce and when it was ready put the brownie on a plate and then covered it with some of the chocolate sauce, she then topped it with some ice cream. She then came for Jaime. "Come on Jaime time for dessert." she said picked you from the bowl and then dangling you above her dessert bowl. As you are held high above the bowl of ice cream and brownie, you think about the people this girl has already devoured either with the bun, her appetiser which she chewed up while you watched plus many others that evening and you are now going to have the same fate as part of her dessert.

Charlotte's belly growled and she lowered you towards the bowl and released the grip on your body. You tumbled and landed on the brownie with a hard thud. Charlotte grinned watching you land and then got a spoon and getting some chocolate sauce drenched you in it. "That's better, you look the part now." she said giggling evilly. The evil young girl then preceeded to devour the brownie, chocolate sauce very quickly and within minutes there was very little left of your landscape. Charlotte lowered her spoon and scooped up the last bit of brownie, some ice cream, chocolate sauce and you from her plate and lifted it into the air holding it infront of her face.

"Well Jaime you are finally going to end up in someone's belly and it is mine. So long. Like my sister said you have seen to much and the only way to prevent you telling anyone about what we have done is sending you to the same place as them" she said.

With that she opened her mouth and slid the spoon between her lips. She didn't even pause before closing her mouth and chewing Jaime up with her mouthful of dessert and having chewed swallowed with a wet gulp.

Charlotte licked her lips. "mmm that was delicious." she said

Lauren came into the kitchen.

"Charlotte you seem to have been ages, have you got rid of Jaime yet?" she asked

"Yes, he went down with my dessert just now and he was absolutely delicious." Charlotte said running her tongue around her mouth.

"Everyone else has been eaten and we all have full tummies, and we are sitting watching TV, you gonna join us." she asked

Natalie laughed evilly.
"Jaime, I'm not joking and I'm not going to ley you out. Well I will once you have passed through my digestive system." she said giggling.

"You can't be serious!" you scream
“Now you stay still! She said.
You did because there really was no way you could run and actually get away as Natalie could easily crush you to death with her huge hand.

The sandwich you were trapped in was lifted higher until you could see the lovely face of Natalie. She was just beaming with delight and licking her lips as she brought the sandwich to her lips.

You knew the end was near and figured that begging wasn’t going to get you out of this.
You decided that this was meant to be. Hot, sweet minty breath flowed over you as Natalie’s open mouth got closer. Then it engulfed the front of the sandwich and you closed your eyes knowing what came next.
Natalie bit down, taking in a quarter of the sandwich. She chewed it up thoroughly and swallowed. Two further mouthfuls were chewed and swallowed and you began to wonder when your time would come. Then you felt a sharp point hit your stomach. With a scream from you Natalie's sharp white teeth sliced clean through your body and pull it into her mouth.
In seconds your body was sliced to pieces by Natalie's powerful teeth and she swallowed licking her lips.

Natalie put the last bit of her sandwich between her lips, chewed and swallowed it.
“Mmm, Jaime you were part of the best lunchtime sandwich I have eaten in a long time,” Natalie said licking some mayonnaise off her lips and rubbing her belly.
She let out a little burp and took the plate and put it in the dishwasher.
She went and laid down on the sofa to take a nap while her stomach digested her lunch.
Jaime had become yet another person who had been captured and devoured alive by an attractive young girl.

Natalie woke up feeling great and she was already thinking about her next victims.

you manage to find a handhold on a pair of blue knickers
12121112111111.content:
Examing yourself, you see that you have survived being washed. It was actually quite a fun experience.

Sarah's mother picks up the basket of wet clothes and goes out the back door, across the garden to the garage where the tumble drier is kept.

As she is walking across the grass, you are hanging on for dear life to the blue top and then you feel the slender grip you have slipping.

You try to find another item of clothing to hold onto
12121112111111.title: In a basket of wet washing

choices: someone is putting on the knickers
someone is folding them up
121211121111112.content:
As you hang from the blue top, the entire shirt is starting to slip from the pile. It fits through one of the plastic openings in the bottom of the basket and is slowly creeping downward. To your right, you get a nice shot of the giantess's legs as she carries you across the yard. To your left, there is a blue pant leg hanging out through another opening. It looks much more secure than where you are at now. You attempt to swing the shirt back and forth a couple times. After a little momentum is built up, you make a leap for the blue pants. Your tiny hands reach out for the material and grab hold. Quickly, you climb back into the basket. Once you are near the top of the pants, you climb into the rear pocket for a break.

Sarah's mom walks into the garage and sits the basket on the ground next to the dryer. She then grabs handfuls of the wet clothing and puts then inside the machine. As you catch your breath, the knickers are picked up and also tossed inside. You crawl into the bottom of the damp pocket and brace for the heat about to come.

At first, you can hardly feel it because of all the water left in the clothing. Then, slowly but surely the temperature increases. The tumbling is almost too much to bear, but you close your eyes and pretend you are on some kind of carnival ride. By the time it is really hot, you end up passing out and vomit from the spinning. When you wake up...
121211121111112.title: Spin Cycle

choices: she spots you and investigates
she ignores whatever it was and shuts her wardrobe door
1212111211111122.content:
When you wake up you are on a soft surface which is green in colour. You look around, you seem to be in someone's bedroom. You can make out a figure a short distance away.
Then a hand picks up the green surface you are on and begins to fold it up. You slide off and land on the bed sheets. The figure is now clearly visible. To your joy you notice it is Sarah. You wave madly trying to attract her attention. But she seems occupied folding up her clean clothes and putting them away in her drawer. She comes across to the bed again and picks up a red blouse, as she picks it up one of the tassells catches you and drags you along the bed sheets. Seein the end of the bed sheet you hang onto the tassell as the blouse is lifted up.
Sarah opens her wardrobe and hangs the blouse up then gets a white blouse and hangs that up
http://img253.imageshack.us/my.php?image...

As she closes the door she notices something different on the tassell of the blouse she has just hung up.

What does she do?

choices: Run
Find a place to hide
1212111212.content:
Thinking for a moment you decide you'll respect Sarah's privacy to a certain degree. You decide to explore her house.

After a few minutes of trying to get off her bed, you jump and roll again. After a not so good landing, you get up and wander down her hallway. You notice movement ahead, It is a Persian cat and has long, white fur. You hope it has not seen you.
Guess not. It turns and spots you.
http://img376.imageshack.us/my.php?image...
Then it approaches you, and fear begins surging through your body. A defensive plan is in order.
1212111212.title: A Persian Cat is in the hallway

On the living room floor

Seeing the cat you turn and flee. Unfortunately the cat gives chase
You turn and flee. Looking back you see the cat is gaining on you. Then it pounces towards you.

Thankfully with the floor being tiles as the cat hits you it sends you sliding along the hallway towards the stairs.
The cat is sliding aswell but manages to stop itself. But you continue on and hit the end of the hallway, and disappear off the end.

You come to land:
12121112121.title: Sliding along the floor persude by a cat

choices: a man whom you presume must be Sarah's father
a cute girl with long brown hair who's asleep
121211121212.content:
Reaching the end of the floor you have been sliding along you see that there is nothing to stop you going over the edge.
On reaching the edge there is nothing to grab onto and you plummet to the ground.

Thankfully you land on a rug on the floor. You have a few bruises but otherwise your completly intact.

"Thank god for that floor." you say in relief to yourself.
"I might have been killed or worse the cat might have eaten me."

You look around and see you that you are in the living room. The walls are white with a blue border circling the room. A widescreen tv is in the corner with two speakers either side of it.

You turn around and spot someone on the sofa. They are laid down and there are noises coming from the kitchen. It sounds like somebody drilling something. You decide to investigate who is on the sofa.

Going across the floor you climb the sofa you reach the top and see lying on the sofa is:
121211121212.title: In the living room

choices: Try and get Lydia's attention
Ignore Lydia and explore more of the house
1212111212122.content:
You reach the top of the sofa to see a cute young girl with brown hair fast asleep. Her body is curled up covering the full length of the sofa.

Suddenly she coughs and wakes up and yawns. You can see she has quite a nice set of teeth which have braces on them. You reckon she is about 11 or 12.

Then an older lady entered the room.
"Oh good your awake Lydia. I wondered when you would wake up." she said

The lady who is obviously Lydia's mother goes into the kitchen.
Clearning your throat you decide to:
1212111212122.title: The brown haired girl wakes up

choices: Sarah's mother finds you
Lydia finds you, but keeps you not telling Sarah or her mother
12121112121221.content:
You climb down onto the sofa and walk over to Lydia. She is wearing a red top and a pair of blue tracksuit bottoms.
The scent of her perfume hits your nose as you approach her. You head for her leg and prod it a few times to get her attention.
You get no reaction so you bite her leg as hard as you can.
Lydia feels something but doesn't look down, she does move her leg though which knocks you over onto your back.

You get up from being knocked on your back and try to get her attention again.

This time she spots you and thinking you are a bug she flicks you onto the floor and then stands up.

"I hate bugs." you hear Lydia say in disgust. "Now where did the little bleader go?" she said

Having been sent flying through the air again you have landed near the widescreen tv. You see Lydia is searching for you on the floor. Eventually she gives up.
"You live for now little bug. When I find you your history."

"Oh thank god I am a lucky bug." you say "If she finds me I'll be history. I've got to get back to Sarah." you say

Meanwhile upstairs Sarah had finished having a shower and was in her room putting on some fresh clothes. She went to her bed and sat down.

"Jaime you still here?" she said softly

No reply came and Sarah began to get worried. She searched her bedroom but couldn't find you. She ran downstairs and began searching for you in the hallway, then the front room and the kitchen but still couldn't find you anywhere. Sarah came into the living room in tears and sat down on the sofa.
"What's the matter Sarah?" her mother said coming in from the kitchen.
"I've lost something and I can't find it." Sarah sobbed.
"What have you lost?" her mother asked

"I suppose I better tell you, but you must keep it a secret." Sarah said drying her eyes.
"OK what is it?" her mother asked

"I found a little boy at school who was about 2 inches tall and I decided to bring him home to see if I could help him. I left him on my bed when I went for a shower and when I came back he wasn't where I left him." Sarah sobbed.

"What does he look like?" Lydia asked

"He's about 2 inches tall with short brown hair and he was wearing his school uniform." Sarah said

"Well let's look for him together, anyway he can't have gone far." said the girls mother.

Lydia, Sarah and their mother began searching the whole house thoroughly and eventually after about an hour of searching:
12121112121221.title: Try to find Sarah

choices: swallow you whole
take you from her mouth and give you to her mother
121211121212212.content:
You see Lydia searching the living room and pray that she won't find you because if she does think your a bug then as she said earlier you would be history.

Sarah's sister Lydia:
http://i67.tinypic.com/53r1i1.jpg

Unfortunately she appears infront of the tv and you realise you have been spotted as a huge hand comes down towards you. Three fingers clamp around your waist and you feel yourself being lifted high into the air. When the ascent stops you are looking into Lydia's beautiful young face.
From your vantage point she looks beautiful.
"Well, what do we have here?" whispered Lydia in amazement
You were quivering with terror in Lydia's hand as she studeied you closely.
"You look so cute and you must be what my elder sister is searching for. Well unfortunately for you I'm not going to tell her I have found you and your're coming with me."

Fear begins to set in as Lydia carries you upstairs and walked down the landing.
"You found anything yet Lydia?" her mother calls.
"No nothing yet, I'll have a look upstairs see if he is up here." she lied as she held you between her hand and went into her room.
She puts you on her bed linen and then lays down on her stomach facing you.
Lying on her bed Lydia could hear her belly gurgling and then an evil smile came over her lips.
She sits up and grins at you.
Fearing what she is thinking you try to run for the edge of the bed.
"I'm feeling hungry little boy and you are just the perfect size for a little snack." said Lydia as she tips her head back and opens her mouth wide.
Looking down this girl has a lovely mouth but should you end up in it then it won't be so lovely as you will no doubt be swallowed alive by her.
She smiles showing her lovely white teeth complete with train-track braces on, licks her lips and then drops you into her mouth and closes it tight shut.

Sarah and her mother come upstairs and Sarah's mother goes into her daughters room and spots her lying on her bed.
"Lydia your supposed to be looking for this lost person for Sarah and here you are lying on your bed. Have you found anything yet?" she said slightly angry.
"No mother." Lydia lied holding you under her tongue so her mother couldn't see you in her mouth.

"Lydia I know when you are lying and I think you are lying now. You know something don't you?" she said

As her mother turns to look around her room Lydia realises her mother's going to find out she's lying and decides to
121211121212212.title: At the mercy of a cute young girl

1212111212122121.content:
Knowing she'll be found out Lydia swallows hard sending you down her throat.

As you slide down Lydia's esophagus screaming, her mother exits the room. Lydia smiles smiles smugly to herself, feeling the struggles of you in her stomach.

A rank, sour smell surrounds your bodies as you splash into the stomach acid below. Humid darkness fills your vision as the unsettling warmth envelops you. Lydia’s stomach gurgles in satisfaction as it receives its newest morsels of food.
The stomach churns and you are thrown about in the darkness. Lydia’s stomach acid slowly begins to strip the flesh off your body. You scream in pain as your legs go numb.
The stomach gurgles violently and a stream of acid engulfs your body. The skin melts off your body little by little forming; it slides along Lydia’s stomach lining into the intestines ahead to be absorbed into her blood stream forever. Within an hour you are no more than a pile of acid-washed bones.

Lydia rubs her stomach and chuckles to herself.
The struggles in her stomach had stopped, and she presumes her stomach acids have digested you.

“You were delicious,” she says to herself as she grins evilly.

Sarah and her mother continue searching the whole house for you but still cannot find you. After a further two hours they decide to give up. Sarah is in tears again and goes to her room and sobs.
Lydia though is giggling to herself in her room as she reads through some mazagines.
She never tells her sister she swallowed her little pet alive and he made a delicious little snack.

If Sarah's mother is to use the vacum cleaner you have to get out of the living room as fast as possible. At
your current height however, that'll be somewhat of a problem.

Can you hold on?

That whole situation nearly gave you a heart attack. The giantess continues to stomp around the living room as she moves in and out of spots with the vacuum.

121221121111.title: Among a Chicken Cesar Salad Wrap

You bounce off of a fluffy white towel and land dazed onto the wet rubber flooring. What you see when you look up is terrifying.

As far as you can see in every direction are legs, of all shapes and sizes. Over two dozen girls are in their swimsuits. Their towering legs crash onto the sqeacky floor left and right. You know you'll have to make a run for it of be squashed.

Like an ant on fire, you scramble in one direction hoping it will lead to an exit. The floor is difficult to navigate. Miles of suction cups placed diagnolally from one another litter the rubber surface, forcing you to zigzag rather than just go straight. A giant foot falls to your right, the sole and toes totally flattening the suction cups under it. You keep running, managing to evade two more feet that you barely are able to outrun.

After looking over your shoulder to see, you turn around and glimpse another foot off in the near distance. It's heel is beginning to lift off the ground. Your eyes follow the shin and thigh all the way upward to the sight of a giant girl in mid-step, her foot hurtling toward you! You shriek and stumble over yourself trying to run in the opposite direction. You get to your feet and run for your life, and in a millesecond the girl's heel has landed mere inches behind you!

The impact of the crash knocks you down! You roll onto your back, looking up at a sole descending straight down at you! Knowing you'll never run out of the way in time, you grimace through the pain and roll between the nearest two suction cups...

You feel like a bomb went off inside your head as the rest of the foot grounds itself right next to your head. The flesh of the foot pushes down on the suction floor, and a blast of air erupts from under it and over your body, bringing you back to senses. You give your head a little tug--it's stuck. The foot landed so close to you a bit of your hair has gotten stuck underneath. You carefully pry yourself loose and back away. Catching your breath, you can only gawk at the massive thing that almost killed you. The foot isn't moving anymore. It's toes toes flex and wiggle in a playful way that belies it's potential danger.

After you stare at it petrified for a second or two, the appendage once again lifts off of the floor with a sticky sound and lifts into the air away from you. You look above you to see that all the girls are now dressed in swimsuits and are heading in the same direction, out of the locker room towards the pool. Your relief is short lived, though, as you turn to your left to see countless pairs of legs stomping their way towards you!

Now that the girls got changed into their swimming costumes, they are heading for the showers! There's no way you'll be able to escape the oncoming herd of piston-like legs, thrashing toes, and deadly soles falling from the sky and smacking the ground one after another.

14.content:
Your name is Richard Metcalfe and you are 20. You have short hair and dark brown eyes.
Richard Metcalfe:
http://img355.imageshack.us/img355/5697/...

It is a lovely summers day and you are laid out in the garden reading a book and in the background is your stereo with a Queen CD playing.

While reading your book you are thinking what you are going to get your girlfriend Jo Bailey for her 21st birthday which is at the end of the month.

Jo Bailey:
http://img233.imageshack.us/img233/8261/...

You have been together for nearly 2 and half years now and your debating whether you should propose to her or not.
It has crossed your mind a few times as she is a beautifully stunning girl with long blond hair, a perfect white smile and lovely blue eyes.
You first met her in a nightclub while out with some of your friends. They teased that she was way out of your league but you didn't want to give up and got chatting with her and found you both had a lot in common. You took her for a meal at a nice restaurant and also to see a film and eventually you asked her if she would go out with you. She agreed straight away and the last two and a half years have been great.
Jo has a lovely smile which was one of the things you noticed when you first met her and she also had a stunning slim figure.

The next morning two letters come for you. One is a credit card bill and the other is from Jo.
Eagerly you open the letter and read it. She has sent you an invitation to her 21st birthday party which she is holding at her house. Their is a letter in the envelope aswell. Reading the letter you notice she is in France at the moment visiting some friends but she will be back prior to her party.

Over the next few weeks you make the decision that you are going to propose to Jo at her party and head out into your local town to buy her a ring.
After visiting many jewellers you find a beautiful ring and decide that is the one for her. It is 9 carret gold with a diamond in with purple colours. Looking at the price you see it is £275.
"Jo is definetly worth that if not more." you say to yourself as you go into the jewellers and pay for it.

As the end of the month nears and the days roll by Jo's birthday party is getting closer and you start to feel nervous.
"It will go fine I'm sure." you mother says one evening as you have been chatting about things releating to proposing to Jo.
"I hope so." you reply

Then finally it is the day of Jo's birthday.
You made sure you wore your best clothes and looked your best.
Your father got his Porsche from the garage,you got into the car with your father and he drove you down the road and off towards a village about 30 minutes away.

Jo lived in quite a big house as he parents were quite rich. Her parents own a top riding school and also are trainers for several top horses. Jo herself owns three horses and has also started appearing in major TV shows.
The car turned off the main road down a long gravel drive lined with trees which led to a huge house at the end.
Your dad stopped the car and you got out.
"I'll pick you up on Sunday afternoon unless I hear from you before. Good luck with the proposal!" said your father as you headed for the front door. You waved to your father as he drove off down the drive.
A big oak door stood infront of you. It had a big gold handle in it and a bell-pull next to it. You tugged on the bell-pull. A ding-a-ling came from inside and the door opened.
Jo's mother (Karen) was stood in the doorway.
"Hi Richard come on in, Jo's just got out the shower, she'll be down in a minute."
"Thanks." you reply
"Help yourself to drinks, their in the lounge." Karen said

You went into the lounge and acknowledged other people who were there. Some of the people you hadn't seen since you were at school and you caught up and relived old times.
Then Jo came into the room, she looked gorgeous wearing a long red dress, her hair was tied back and she had a silver pair of shoes on.
Her eyes sparkled as she spotted her boyfriend.
Richard turned and saw his girlfriend.
"Wow, Jo you look stunning." you say as you glide over to her and she throws her arms around you and gives you a long passionate kiss.

info.brief_description: You shrink and have a choice of 5 scenarios

You mysteriously shrink. From 5 choices will you be able to be returned to your normal size or will you be unlucky and end up being crushed, captured and tortured or eaten by someone.

Your task as the reader is to try and get help and avoid being killed.

Please add and rate and I look forward to seeing your additions.
